quotes.quote: Sometimes when I close my eyes, I can't see.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: A cop pulled me over and told me 'Papers', so I said 'Scissors, I win!'
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Don't disturb me, I am disturbed enough already.
quotes.author: Disturbed

quotes.quote: I don't mean to brag, but I put together a puzzle in 1 day and the box said 2-4 years.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: Just because I can't sing doesn't mean that I won't sing.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.quote: Fart when someone hugs you, it makes them feel strong.
quotes.author: Aubrey Plaza

quotes.quote: Roses are red, my name is not Dave, this makes no sense, microwave.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I just wanted you to know that somebody cares. Not me, but somebody does.
quotes.author: Anthony Jeselnik

quotes.quote: Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: I would like to apologize to anyone whom I haven't offended yet. Please be patient, I will get to you shortly.
quotes.author: Every Republican 2020

quotes.quote: Doing nothing is hard, you never know when your done.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: There are no stupid questions, just stupid people.
quotes.author: Neil Degrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: No matter how smart you are you can never convince someone stupid that they are stupid.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
